name: NSData.ReadingOptions
desc: Options for methods used to read data objects.

items.name: static var mappedIfSafe: NSData.ReadingOptions
items.desc: A hint indicating the file should be mapped into virtual memory, if possible and safe.

items.name: static var uncached: NSData.ReadingOptions
items.desc: A hint indicating the file should not be stored in the file-system caches.

items.name: static var alwaysMapped: NSData.ReadingOptions
items.desc: Hint to map the file in if possible.
